name: Bomb Squad
overview: A game dedicated to all of the men and women, who's job is to protect and serve the public. Thank you... First choose your player and name him. Each of the 4 Bomb Squad members have different levels and ranks. You have pullers and cutter tools and must use your moves wisely to disable the explosive before the time runs out. Cut in the wrong place and you may detonate and destroy a building. Luckily you get to continue. Good luck, no booms!
